Articles.Content:
My attempt to give the X-15 a go in Real Solar System. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RWdyYc45L6Q?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Mods:**

***X-15***

Gear from Firespitter and KAX

Wings/control surfaces are B9 proc parts

Decals from Nebula

Engine model from FASA overhauled to be the X-15's XLR-99 by Realism Overhaul

Cockpit is stock, painted black with KerbPaint

***B-52 'Balls-8'***

Cockpit from SXT

Engines models from B9, overhauled for realism by AJE

*Other mods to note:* Aviation Lights, FAR, RSS, RSS:Visual Enhancements, Realism Overhaul, RealFuels, Advanced Jet Engine, KerbCam, CameraTools

The Edwards AFB terrain mesh was placed with KerbalKonstructs and is part of a little mod I'm (slowly) working on for RSS.
